settings.banner_sort_first: As one of the first ever demi-fine jewellery brands, we have been going since 2008. Designing all our unique and iconic pieces in-house at our London based Notting Hill HQ, we now ship to over 200 countries worldwide and partner with some of the world’s top retailers.

settings.ourmission_description_first: We’ve been doing this since 2008, and were one of the first brands to create jewellery that was in between fashion and fine.
settings.ourmission_description_second: We’ve been doing this since 2008, and were one of the first brands to create jewellery that was in between fashion and fine.

settings.materials_description: Our approach to sustainability means we hold ourselves accountable for the people we work alongside, the planet we contribute to as well as the products we create. We see it as our duty, both as a business and a community that cares, to play our part in the chain.
